title: Teleport Nerf
body: Whats everyones thoughts on the teleport channel time increase? It has obviously effected a split pushers chances of joining a teamfight and flanking teleports. Is it still worth taking top lane?

replies.body:
You don't know how many muffins I have missed due to this stupid teleport re-work.

goddamnit grandma

Low ranks; the change means shit all, they ain't going to notice the TP quick enough for 1 extra second to matter
Higher ranks; It's basically going to be mostly useful for getting into lane OR getting into fights where the enemy team is already fully committed and if that's the case, it's already a bad tp.

Yes, even though teleport was nerfed to be slightly longer, it still provides you a far greater map presence such as being able to claim towers where a super wave is, being able to join team members before  or during a team fight and flanking.  One extra second on the channel time only gives them one more second to react which still isn't a lot of time especially if they don't even notice you coming in.
